companyid.title: Company ID
companyid.description: Can be found under QuickBooks account's "Account and Setting".

endpoints.title: Endpoints
endpoints.description: Select which endpoints you want to process.

reports.title: Reports
reports.description: Select which reports you want to process.

summarize_column_by.title: Summarize Column By (optional)
summarize_column_by.description: Enables Grouping for ProfitAndLossQuery** endpoint. Does not affect other reports.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Valid types are: PrevMonthStart, PrevMonthEnd or a date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Only affects reports.

end_date.title: End date
end_date.description: Valid types are: PrevMonthStart, PrevMonthEnd or a date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Only affects reports.

load_type.title: Load Type
load_type.description: If Full load is used, the destination table will be overwritten every run. If incremental load is used, data will be upserted into the destination table. Tables with a primary key will have rows updated, tables without a primary key will have rows appended.
